name: Gost Life
description:
This is a small game made for a unreal 4 game jam, so dont expect too much.
If the game is love i might make a real game out of it.

The goal of the game is to scare human out of their house.
Interacting with the object in the house will scare the human

CONTROL:
WASD: move
E: for interact with (lamp, door, alarm, pot)
Escape: Open game menu
